function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction workforce concerns about working in close proximity at the end of projects due to COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced productivity, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, providing personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, virtual collaboration tools","People":"Construction workers, site supervisors, contractors","Owner":"Construction companies, project owners, developers"},{"Description":"Reduced workforce and site-supervision workers leading to increased risk of infections","Impact":"Project delays, increased operational costs, reduced productivity","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, providing remote supervision tools","Technologies":"Remote monitoring systems, wearable technology for contact tracing","People":"Project owners, developers, site-supervision workers","Owner":"Construction companies, project owners, developers"},{"Description":"Shrinking workforce crew size due to the pandemic leading to less group activities and more defined procedures","Impact":"Reduced productivity, potential safety hazards due to unfamiliar or changed procedures","Mitigation":"Providing training on new procedures, implementing clear communication protocols","Technologies":"Virtual training platforms, communication apps for remote teams","People":"Construction workers, crew supervisors","Owner":"Construction companies, crew supervisors"}]}
